* Schedule a Meet & Greet with the Mayor


Schedule a Meet & Greet with the Mayor
======================================

If you would like to schedule a Meet & Greet with Mayor Mapp, Please fill out the form below.

Should you have any questions, please contact the Office of the Mayor at 908-753-3310

Copy and paste this code into your website.

```
<a href="http://www.plainfieldnj.gov/government/mayor/schedule_a_meet-n-greet_with_the_mayor.php">Your Link Name</a>
```
